name: Sokemboj
description:
Sokemboj is a short (5-15 minutes) but very unique game. You play as a gunner on a spaceship. You control the ships battle system with only your keyboard. You must find the optimal strategy and hit your shots to win the battle and survive.

The game is designed to be played with an english keyboard layout.

Original desing and programming by:
Vít Dostál

Original art by:
Bořek Hnyk (https://www.instagram.com/borekhnyk/)
Vojtěch Linka

Original sound and music by:
Malcolm Edwards

This game was made as a fun  project of 4 first year collage students from Czech Republic in the summer of 2020. It was our first attempt to make a game. We hope you like it. Let us know what you think in the comment below.
